content: > you can find the free version of this > pattern on my blog here 1 this > downloadable pdf contains the full > pattern in one ad-free printable > file the ombre moss stitch cowl is worked in the round and uses only three basic stitches the chain stitch the single_crochet stitch and the slip_stitch so this pattern would be great for everybody it was made from one of my favourite yarns at the moment drops babyalpaca silk it s so soft and perfect to use on crochet project like this cowl because looks so cozy i used there three colors to achieve the ombre effect the pattern has both chart and written instruction **materials & tools ** 1 yarn 3 skeins of drops babyalpaca silk 70% alpaca 30% silk 50g/167m in 3 different colors yarn a powder 1306 yarn b light old pink 3250 yarn c heather 4088 2 hook size 3 5 mm for body of the cowl and 2 5 mm for ribbing adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge 3 tapestry needle to weave and hide yarn ends 4 scissor **difficulty ** beginner - if you don t know how to do the moss stitch check out my tutorial on my blog **finished size** approx 27 cm wide across middle not across ribbing approx 34 cm long **gauge** 25 sts and 30 row = 10 cmx 10 cm using the moss stitch gauge is not crucial for this project however changes might result in a different yardage requirement **multi-item discounts** 1 use code **3items** get 15% off when you have 3 items in your cart 2 use code **4items** enjoy 20% off your entire order with 4 items in your cart 3 use code **5items** indulge in a 25% discount when you add 5 items to your cart 4 use code **6items** for the ultimate savings enjoy a whopping 40% off when you have 6 or more items in your cart > subscribe to my newsletter 2 and be > the first to know about new patterns > and design tutorials and more join > my facebook group 3 and official > ravelry group 4 where you can find > necessary support you can ask > questions or share your finished > projects you can also follow my > instagram 5 facebook page 6 and > pinterest 7 1 https //mycrochetory com/ombre-moss-stitch-cowl-free-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //mycrochetory us19 list-manage com/subscribe u=c0df7483341179616a560ff5a&id=da5321fe6c 3 https //www facebook com/groups/939060686484870/ source_id=381840245571840 4 https //www ravelry com/groups/mycrochetory-designs 5 https //www instagram com/mycrochetory/ hl=pl 6 https //www facebook com/mycrochetory/ ref=aymt_homepage_panel&eid=ardf_cwil9km8fcuwcettlgrhjotvx90e0zk15g4vcnijlqk0s54ur7jmqxxmptq0hwfpvjdve6mruan 7 https //pl pinterest com/mycrochetory/
